snippet: A new study shows how Fortune 500 companies have managed to shelter trillions of dollars in profits offshore from being taxed, leaving Mr. Trump in the dust....
abstract: Andrew Ross Sorkin Dealbook submits Donald J Trump is just small fry among those who use loopholes and shelters to avoid paying taxes; notes study of Fortune 500 companies finds that many shelter trillions of dollars offshore and that government could collect billions of dollars from them if key adjustments were made to current tax code.
lead_paragraph: A new study shows how Fortune 500 companies have managed to shelter trillions of dollars in profits offshore from being taxed, leaving Mr. Trump in the dust.

headline.print_headline: In Avoiding Tax, Trump Is Merely a Small Fry
headline.main: When It Comes to Tax Avoidance, Donald Trump’s Just a Small Fry
